name: Chrome

pages.text: $(thing)Chrome$() and $(thing)Chromium$() are $(thing)Steel-tier$() metals added by Firmalife. They are used in the construction of $(l:tfc:firmalife/greenhouse)Chrome Greenhouses$().
Chromite is an ore that is melted to obtain Chromium. It is found in $(thing)Igneous Intrusive$() and $(thing)Metamorphic$() rocks.
